chart.title: Levelized cost of energy for renewables by country
chart.subtitle: The average cost per unit of energy generated across the lifetime of a new power plant. This data is expressed in US dollars per [kilowatt-hour](#dod:watt-hours). It is adjusted for inflation but does not account for differences in living costs between countries.
chart.note: Data is expressed in constant 2023 US$.

Bioenergy levelized cost of energy.descriptionShort: This data is expressed in US dollars per kilowatt-hour. It is adjusted for inflation but does not account for differences in living costs between countries.
descriptionKey: Levelized cost of energy (LCOE) estimates the average cost per unit of energy generated across the lifetime of a new power plant. It is measured in US$ per kilowatt-hour.
